modShortDescription: This changes the boulders (ResourceStones) in game to give you a small chance at mining: Coal, Potassium Nitrate Powder, Lead, Sand and Clay.
modDescription:
This is a small mod AaronG85 modified based on the work of [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/).

This changes the boulders (ResourceStones) in game to give you a small chance at [mining](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-mining/): Coal, Potassium Nitrate Powder, Lead, Sand and Clay

This also gives you a rare chance of mining: Brass, Silver, Gold and Dimond

Also gives the ability to mine a small amount of iron from terrestrial stone boulders.

The percentages can be changed higher or lower to suit your gaming needs via the blocks.xml.

**NOTE:** This changes all boulders currently, If anyone has any tips on how to make the changes ONLY affect the ResourceStone Boulder, not the specialized boulders, they are very welcome to [PM](https://community.7daystodie.com/profile/17912-aarong85/) him so he can implement it.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1rI34W9VePcpvOIZQqCogfLudb80GL36u)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19748-aarong85s-ultimate-rock-a19/).

**Credits:** [AaronG85](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/aarong85/)
